title: 只要下载无尽贪婪mod就崩溃
author: McZaochen
txt_content:
请点明解决方法，日志下面和附件都有
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I blame Dinnerbone.

Time: 19-5-31 下午6:30
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: net.minecraftforge.oredict.OreDictionary.doesOreNameExist(Ljava/lang/String;)Z

replies.author: 机械自律体
replies.txt_content: forge好像太老了更新下试试（common出的问题）。看内存分配不排除你分的内存少（1024试试）.

replies.author: McZaochen
replies.txt_content: 在mojang界面出现两秒后就崩

replies.author: McZaochen
replies.txt_content:
cuizhixiang 发表于 2019-5-31 20:59
forge好像太老了更新下试试（common出的问题）。看内存分配不排除你分的内存少（1024试试）. ...
还是不行
这句话什么意思？[21:56:43]?[Client?thread/WARN]?[Avaritia]:?Mod?Avaritia?is?missing?the?required?element?'version'?and?a?version.properties?file?could?not?be?found.?Falling?back?to?metadata?version?1.13

replies.author: 机械自律体
replies.txt_content: https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... es/2522249/download装这个删[内存清理MOD][1.7.10].jar试试（这稳定性我不知道）

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: net.minecraftforge.oredict.OreDictionary.doesOreNameExist(Ljava/lang/String;)Z
你的forge版本或游戏版本太低，要么安装更高的forge版本，要么降低无尽贪婪的版本，要么别玩1.7版本的mc，换高版本
